item.title: gulp - One problem i found when i use CSS minify with some CSS library
item.description: gulp - One problem i found when i use CSS minify with some CSS library When i use pure. And i use gulp as my front-end build tool. I used cssmin as my CSS minify tool. By default it can extreme compress CSS file. The one problem happen! display not match Because use CSS minify can remove inherited CSS property. So in webkit browser doesn’t has display: -webkit-flex; and layout
